biotools.summary: Motif discovery software based on MEME algorithm for a single GPU device using CUDA programming model. At present, it only supports the OOPS and ZOOPS models.

bioschemas.name: CUDA-MEME
bioschemas.summary: Motif discovery software based on MEME algorithm for a single GPU device using CUDA programming model. At present, it only supports the OOPS and ZOOPS models.
